name: Reach the Number +
description:
Reach the Number (RtN) plus is a competitive puzzle game of math. Players have to Reach the Number using four mathematical operations.

It is a mix of Countdown, Candy Crush, and 2048 but with 2-4 player local multiplayer 

How to Play

  • Your goal is to make your current number in your player color equal to the number in the middle of the board.
  • You do this by destroying a block.
  • If two blocks with the same operation collide, they merge into one.
  • When a player Reaches a target Number, a new target is given for all players.
  • When targets have been reached for certain times, game ends (default: 3)

Controller Schemes

  • Keyboard WASD + Space
  • Keyboard Arrows + Enter
  • Gamepads
